name: RJS Leather Kraft
description: Manufacturer and Supplier of a wide asso
overview:
Founded in the year 2010, at Delhi (India) we, “RJS Leather Kraft”, are the leading names engaged in manufacturing and supplying of a comprehensive assortment of Ladies Wallets, Ladies Purse, Ladies Bags, Wallets, Bags, Belts, Card Case, Passport Holder, Key Ring, Bar Sets, Wine Case and Mobile Covers, etc. Entire range is precisely manufactured using optimum quality raw material and sophisticated technology; these are designed with great accuracy in order to meet the set international quality norms.

Our offered products: Ladies Purse Ladies Bags Gents Wallets Travel Bags Gents Belts

Our Quality Assurance: It is quality product range and precise, effective services, which make us a reputed Organization. We procure our products from a trusted vendor base, who use only quality raw material to manufacture the products. These manufacturers adopt modernised machinery and technology to fabricate their products, which account for the dimensional accuracy and superior service.

Client Satisfaction: Since the established by our firm, we believe in building mutual relationship with our valuable clients. Our good dealing system and transparent policies are highly appreciated by our esteemed clients. Further, we have a specialized professional team who sincerely works in the field of maintaining good relationship with clients and also look after to provide client’s assignment within stipulated time frame.

Research And Development: Our company is also outfitted with advanced research and development unit that help us to conduct in-depth research and development activities related with our quality products. With the help of our Research And Development unit that is equipped with all the latest machines, tools and equipment, we are able to undertake all the research related work of our range.
